element.name: Planeshifted Guide to the Ten Realms of Kaldheim

description.p: Explore the Ten Realms of Magic: The Gathering's Norse-isnpired setting of Kaldheim in this rules expansion and setting guide for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition.

element.name: Humanoid Human
element.source: Planeshifted Guide to the Ten Realms of Kaldheim

description.p: You are a Humanoid. You are also considered a human for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be a human.

sheet.description: Humanoid. You are also considered a human for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be a human.
